Name: Snuffles and Co.
About the game: Snuffles & Co. is a top-down multi-tasking game with a very simple concept: get Snuffles and his friends safely to their homes. With your birds eye view of all the hazards ahead of them, you will need to micromanages each pooch to get them to safety. You will need to be vigilant to safeguard these puppies keeping your eyes open for lasers, shifting walls, and the honey badger! It's highly recommended that you grow two more eyes before picking up this title.
